name: Unstaball (Jarpg)
description:
Traverse unstable platforms to reach new high scores.

Each platform is procedurally generated and presents their own unique challenges.

Green - Safe

Blue - Speeds player up while touching

Purple - Player sticks to platform and has to jump to move 

Yellow - Moving platform

Orange - Spins around on touch

Red - Disappears shortly after touch

*Note: This game was made in about 8 hours as part of Ludum Dare 49. It is not polished whatsoever, but I found it fun and hope you can enjoy it as well!
